graph.name: graph
graph.label: Disk Utilization
graph.rrdcreatestring: $RRDTOOL$ create $RRDNAME$ --step 300 --start n-1yr $LISTSTART$DS:$LABEL#$:GAUGE:1800:U:U DS:$LABEL#$_wn:GAUGE:1800:U:U DS:$LABEL#$_cr:GAUGE:1800:U:U DS:$LABEL#$_mx:GAUGE:1800:U:U $LISTEND$ RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:1:8640 RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:12:9480
